!4 User permission tests
 * '''Case 1''': It should be possible to control '''creation''' of records using permission units
  * '''1a''': A user must not be able to '''create''' records with permission units not matching the user itself
  * '''1b''': A user must be able to '''create''' records with permission units matching the user itself
 * '''Case 2''': Action links should conform to what the permission units allow when reading a record
  * '''2a''': A user should only get actionLinks to read when reading a record that have a permission unit not allowed to the user
  * '''2b''': A user should get all expected actionLinks when readin a record that the user have permission to
 * '''Case 3''': It should be possible to control '''updating''' of records using permission units
  * '''3a''': A user must be able to '''update''' a record with a permission unit matching one of the user's permission units
  * '''3b''': A user must be able to '''update''' records to ''move'' a record from one permission unit to another one matching one of the user's permission units
  * '''3c''': A user must '''not''' be able to '''update''' records to ''move'' a record from one permission unit to another one '''not''' matching one of the user's permission units
  * '''3d''': A user must '''not''' be able to '''update''' records with permission units '''not''' matching the user itself
 * '''Case 4''': It should be possible to control '''deletion''' of records using permission units
  * '''4a''': It must not be possible to '''delete''' a record with a permission unit not matching the user itself
  * '''4b''': It must be possible to '''delete''' a record with a permission unit matching the user itself
